section.p: You must open a document before you can start translating.
If the selected document has not been analyzed, automatically analyzes the document based on the properties of the document and the folder. For more information on the analysis, see .

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The Document List window of the respective folder is active.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
The document from the Document List window
Open from the File menu
Alternatively, double-click the document in the Document List window.
You are taken to the , where the selected document is contained in the Translation window.

section.title: Results
section.p: The document is segmented and you can start translating it.
To leave the , you must close the document.
